docs.lead_paragraph: Minnesota Coach Richard Pitino, the son of Louisville’s Rick Pitino, will lead the Gophers in the N.I.T. semifinal Tuesday against Florida State at Madison Square Garden.
docs.abstract: Minnesota men's basketball coach Richard Pitino, son of Louisville coach Rick Pitino, has led Gophers to National Invitation Tournament semifinals at Madison Square Garden, giving the extended Pitino family a reason to gather in the city it considers a second home.
